Law Firm

The law firm provides legal services based on the highest standards, legal and ethical, with the aim of legal protection of the interests of clients, which is perceived as good, parental

Proposal

As far as legal counseling is concerned, the Law Firm supports clients in all cases related to trade turnover, that are connected with civil law, commercial law, labour law, administrative law, exchange law, banking law and customs law. Furthermore, the Law Firm represents clients in all proceedings: legal and administrative in common courts, administrative courts and other limbs of the law.

The Law Firm offers the following legal services:

Running of trials in common courts and administrative courts, representing the client in other limbs of law and institutions, participation on trials as a proxy

Preparation of drafts of all types of contracts (civil, commercial, labor), claims and other legal documents

General consultations and consultations in special legal issues,complex legal consultations within the framework of the enterprise functioning, regardless of the legal form of its management, legal consultations in the field of foreign currency law,customs and Bank account

Regular meetings with the management of companies to discuss legal issues

Preparing drafts of legal acts,preparing written legal opinions and legal information, supervising companies registration, submitting changes to registrar of companies “KRS” (the National Business Register), preparing the projects of the resolutions of annual meeting of shareholders

Negotiating conditions and warranties of contracts on behalf of the client, mediation in legal disputes and other discussions, vindication of dues

Monitoring and informing about changes in legislation, important from the point of view of the functioning of the entrepreneur

Establishment of trading companies

Legal advice in the acquisition of real estate

Preparation and conduct of legal audit – the so-called Legal Due Diligence

You can receive all the other details of the offer and the offered conditions of cooperation on the direct presentation meeting with the representative of the Law Firm

Cooperation

I am always open to effective cooperation!

In order to provide clients with a full service the Law Firm currently cooperates with the notary and the effective bailiff office as well as the sworn translators of foreign languages, the real estate appraiser (valuer), the patent office and experts from other disciplines related to the legal services. The Law Firm, expanding the scope of the services provided upon the local market of Greater Poland, establishes relationships with other lawyers and law firms in the country and abroad fulfilling the current needs of the customers and their issues.

In connection with this, the Law Firm is interested in any new contact, which is associated with the concrete proposals of the cooperation, mainly, with entrepreneurs (legal entities and natural persons) already established, or just wishing to organize and develop their business in Poland.
